definition: Ningyuan county in Yongzhou 永州[Yong3 zhou1], Hunan
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: Ningyuan County is a hilly district.
sentences.chinese: 寧遠縣是一個丘陵地區。
